predicate.note: Frames file for 'accompany' based on sentences in financial subcorpus and automatic expansion via verbnet.

example.name: active
example.text: The figure was incorrectly shown as a net loss in a chart accompanying Friday's Heard on the Street column.
example.arg: Friday 's Heard on the Street column

example.name: passive
example.text: Mr. Dempsey estimated that the issue's London debut was accompanied *trace* by ``very, very heavy turnover -- between five million and six million shares.''
example.arg: ``very, very heavy turnover -- between five million and six million shares

example.name: with start and end point, verbnetted
example.text: John led the unhappy group of travellers from the frying pan to the fire.
